tasks.task: Participate in a webinar on growing garlic and other alliums in North Dakota
subtasks: Present the agenda for the webinar
Introduce the speaker, Dr. Harleen Hatterman Valenti
Discuss garlic cultivation basics (soil, pH, nutrition, irrigation)
Explain garlic cultivar trials and optimal varieties for North Dakota
Cover onion production (classification, sets vs. seed, spacing, weed control)
Explain leek growing requirements (starting from seed, mulching, harvest)
Address common questions about alliums, including flowering, naturalization, and pest management
Promote completion of a survey and upcoming webinars
